title: Google’s AI Tools Face EU Antitrust Investigation
description: Google is facing an antitrust investigation in Europe tied to its artificial intelligence (AI) tools.
content:
The European Commission (EC) announced Tuesday (Dec. 9) that it is looking into whether Google had hindered competition by imposing unfair conditions on content creators, and by giving its own AI model an edge over competitors.
The investigation will... [1876 chars]

title: We shouldn’t sell AI chips to China
description: Who wins the global race for artificial intelligence will determine whether this century is defined by American freedom or Chinese tyranny.
content: And yet the White House is finalizing details for its approval of the sale of these chips to China. These processors will not be powering video games. They will be powering autonomous drones, robotic reconnaissance units, AI-guided targeting systems,... [3665 chars]

title: Microsoft announces USD 17.5 billion investment to advance India's AI infrastructure
description: Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella announced on Tuesday that the company will invest USD 17.5 billion in India to support the country's rapidly expanding artificial intelligence ecosystem.
content:
Bellevue [US], December 9 (ANI): Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella announced on Tuesday that the company will invest USD 17.5 billion in India to support the country's rapidly expanding artificial intelligence ecosystem.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Microsoft Bets Big on India's AI Future with $17.5 Billion Investment
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

description: Microsoft on Tuesday unveiled about $23 billion in new artificial intelligence investments, with the bulk earmarked for India as it deepens its bet on one of the world's fastest-growing digital...
content:
BENGALURU, Dec 9 (Reuters) - Microsoft on Tuesday unveiled about $23 billion in new artificial intelligence investments, with the bulk earmarked for India as it deepens its bet on one of the world's fastest-growing digital markets.

title: Microsoft's Satya Nadella meets PM Modi, commits USD 17.5 billion investment to India’s AI push
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella met PM Modi on Tuesday and announced a USD 17.5 billion investment in India to boost the country’s Artificial Intelligence infrastructure and skills, marking the company’s largest-ever commitment in Asia.
content:
Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella on Tuesday announced a commitment of USD 17.5 billion — the company’s largest investment in Asia — to strengthen India’s Artificial Intelligence (AI) infrastructure and skill development.
Nadella made the announcement on X... [438 chars]

title: AI models can rival humans in anonymizing patient information from electronic health records
description: Researchers from the University of Oxford have benchmarked artificial intelligence (AI) tools capable of automatically removing personal information from patient electronic health records (EHRs) in a key step toward enabling large-scale, confidential medical research.

title: Brookfield, Qatar Launch $20B AI Infrastructure Joint Venture
description: Brookfield and Qai, an artificial intelligence company owned by Qatar's sovereign wealth fund, have formed a $20 billion joint venture to develop artificial intelligence infrastructure in Qatar and select international markets, the two groups said Tuesday.

title: 'Massive risk': One in four teenagers use AI for mental health support
description: Research by the Youth Endowment Fund found teenagers are increasingly turning online for mental health support as artificial intelligence becomes key resource. | ITV National News
content:

title: The Latest: Trump approves sale of more advanced Nvidia computer chips used in AI to China
description: President Donald Trump says he'll allow Nvidia to sell an advanced type of computer chip used in the development of artificial intelligence to “approved customers” in China.
content:
President Donald Trump said Monday that he would allow Nvidia to sell an advanced type of computer chip used in the development of artificial intelligence to “approved customers” in China.
